aboutusintro.title: About Rajesh Metals
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Since 1984
aboutusintro.description: Established in 1984, Rajesh Metals has been a leading brass manufacturing specialist in Jamnagar. We provide comprehensive brass part solutions using cutting-edge technology and decades of engineering expertise. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction drives our continued growth and success.

items.name: Rajesh Patel
items.content: Rajesh Metals consistently delivers high-quality brass components with exceptional precision. Their attention to detail and timely delivery make them our preferred manufacturing partner.

items.name: Amit Sharma
items.content: We've been working with Rajesh Metals for over a decade. Their custom brass manufacturing capabilities and reliability are unmatched in the industry.
